title: 1BR BEACH CONDO – FURNISHED – CENTRAL – WALK 2 BEACH & GROCERY – POOL!
posting_body: ['----------------------------------------------', 'OVERVIEW / HIGHLIGHTS', '----------------------------------------------', 'Seeking to rent my fully-stocked and furnished condo for UP TO 3.5 MONTHS (from SEPT 1 - DEC 18, 2022).', 'Luxury 1br condo located in the “heart” of Palm Beach, at the famed Palm Beach Hotel & Condominiums.', 'Equipped with stocked kitchen, queen bed, queen sofabed, and heated pool!', 'However, the best thing about this place is its INCREDIBLE LOCATION.', "Set in the heart of Palm Beach, it's just ONE BLOCK from just about everything including: THE BEACH, supermarket, banks, and dozens of shops & restaurants!", "You don't need a car, and can WALK EVERYWHERE!!!", '–– VERY CENTRAL location, just 1 block from BEACH, inter-coastal, supermarket, banks, shops & restaurants in heart of Palm Beach!', '–– VERY SAFE and QUIET neighborhood', '–– CAN WALK EVERYWHERE!', 'Thus, no car needed!', '–– TURN-KEY FURNISHED with everything you need, right down to the soap, towels and sheets.', '–– FULLY STOCKED KITCHEN with everything you need for cooking!', '–– SLEEPS 4 PEOPLE in 1br (queen) + pullout sofabed (queen) in livingroom', '–– CONDO-HOTEL AMENITIES, including a heated POOL, outdoor terraces, lounge-rooms, library, garden, & grill.', '–– SPARKLING CLEAN:', 'Fully "Covid-compliant" with extensive cleaning protocols to ensure health and safety of all guests.', '----------------------------------------------', 'PRICE / AVAILABILITY:', '----------------------------------------------', 'Available for MONTHLY RENTAL, for UP TO 3.5 MONTHS from SEPT 1 through DEC 18, 2022.', '~ 3.5 MONTHS STAY: $2,590 /mo (plus 13% tax)', '~ 2 MONTHS STAY: $2,890 /mo (plus 13% tax)', '~ 1 MONTHS STAY: $3,290 /mo (plus 13% tax)', '***ALL UTILITIES INCLUDED!!', '(Includes Water, Electric, Phone, Cable, & WIFI/Internet).', 'One-time (post-stay) cleaning fee of $99.', 'Palm Beach monthly parking placard available for rental (for $125/month).', 'WHY SO AFFORDABLE?', "–– I'm offering this at a slightly discounted rate because I'd rather fill the unit sooner, rather than wait around.", "Also I'd like to find a good tenant that will take care of the place, and is flexible to stay during my defined dates (SEPT - DEC 2022).", 'MY CREDIBILITY: I’m a long-term, vacation-rental owner and typically rent this condo for much higher prices.', 'However because of the pandemic disruptions, I’m offering it here at a lower rate.', 'I know Craigslist can be a bit “sketchy,” so I’m happy to provide any information needed to demonstrate my credibility.', 'I can provide you with my owner profiles on AIRBNB / VRBO, which are full of raving guest reviews.', 'I’d also be happy to answer any questions you have, offer a written lease agreement, or transact through paypal/credit card or airbnb, if needed.', '----------------------------------------------', 'CENTRAL LOCATION:', '----------------------------------------------', '–– VERY CENTRAL:', 'Located in the HEART of Palm Beach Island', '–– BEACH:', 'Exactly 1 Block from the BEACH on the east, and 1 Block from the intercoastal on the west.', 'You can walk there!', '–– CONVENIENCE:', 'The location is unbeatable.', 'It is right across the street from Publix Supermarket, and there are dozens of Shops, Restaurants, Churches Synagogues, Pharmacies, Banks etc all within 1 BLOCK WALKING!', '–– WALK EVERYWHERE:', 'Everything you need is so close by, there is virtually no need for a car', '–– SAFE & QUIET:', 'The area and building is EXTREMELY SAFE & QUIET...', 'Likely one of the safest places in FL', '----------------------------------------------', 'CONDO / HOTEL AMENITIES:', '----------------------------------------------', '–– CONDO/HOTEL:', 'Located at the Historic Palm Beach Hotel & Condominiums (235 Sunrise Avenue, Palm Beach, FL 33480)', '–– SAFE / SERVICE: 24-hour Security & Front-Desk Reception', '–– MAJOR AMENITIES:', 'Heated Pool, Humungous Covered Patio, 24-hour Reception Service, Mezzanine Library / Study Room, Salon/Spa, Public Gardens & Picnic Areas, Gas / Charcoal BBQ', '–– LAUNDRY:', 'Downstairs Building Laundry Facilities', '–– PARKING:', 'Unlimited Street-side Parking (with "paid parking permit," available for rental upon request)', '----------------------------------------------', 'ABOUT APARTMENT:', '----------------------------------------------', '–– 3rd Floor Unit!', '–– 1 Bedroom / 1 Bath', '–– SLEEPS 4 PEOPLE: Queen bed + Queen Sofabed', '–– FULLY FURNISHED:', 'Including Queen Bed Set, Convertible Sofabed (Queen), Living-room Set, TV, All Kitchenware, Towels / Bedding', '–– NEWLY RENOVATED: Original Oak Wood Floors, Oak Cabinets, Custom Crown Molding', '–– NEW APPLIANCES: Fridge / Freezer, Cooktop, Microwave, Toaster-over, Coffee-maker, Hot-water Kettle, Air Condition', '–– WORK-FROM-HOME READY, offering a large desk, many outlets, high-speed wireless internet, and multiple "workspaces" throughout the building (library / study room, lobby, & large patio deck).', '----------------------------------------------', 'TENANT REQUIREMENTS:', '----------------------------------------------', '–– Honest, Clean, and Responsible', '–– Stable Income', '–– Able to pay First Month + Security Deposit upfront', '–– No Smoking', '–– No Pets', '----------------------------------------------', 'IF INTERESTED:', '----------------------------------------------', 'Please EMAIL ME via Craigslist with the following info.', "I'll get back to you within 72 hrs:", "(1) What's your general situation & reason for visiting / moving?", '(2) What dates are you looking to rent for?', '(3) For how many people?', "(4) Where do you work and what's your job?", '(5) Do you smoke or have any pets?', '(6) Would you prefer to transact through airbnb, or using a typical lease contract instead?', '(Note: If we use a typical lease contract, we would need to require a security deposit upfront)', '(I can also provide our airbnb listing link if needed)', '(7) What phone or email can I contact you back at?', 'And when is usually a good time to talk?']
